config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'MEDIA' is retrieved from the hints map using the key 'KEY_MEDIA'. If the value is not found in the hints map, it falls back to the superclass method to get the media configuration.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'MEDIA' configuration depends on when the getMedia() method is called in the code. If the method is called frequently, the configuration will be triggered more often.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'MEDIA' configuration option on the system is minimal as it simply retrieves a value from the hints map or falls back to the superclass method. It does not have a significant impact on the overall system performance.
